title: “Justice” Died Yesterday (Ep 1780)
description:
In this episode, I address the atrocious breaking news about the Clinton-connected lawyer. I also address Biden’s latest attack on the Second Amendment.

News Picks:

Hillary Clinton connected lawyer found “not guilty.” 

The CBO confirms Bidenflation is real.


Fact-check: Biden makes false, misleading statements about Second Amendment to reporters.


More bad news about the vaccines.


CNN Writer Oliver Darcy Roasted for Encouraging Disinfo over Trump NRA Speech.
